# EG Awards of 2011

| venue = Prince Bandroom, Melbourne, Victoria

The EG Awards of 2011 are the sixth Annual The Age EG (Entertainment Guide) Awards and took place at the Prince Bandroom on 23 November 2011.
Hall of Fame inductees
Hoodoo Gurus and Stephen 'The Ghost' Walker.
Award nominees and winners
Winners indicated below in boldface
{| class=wikitable style="width="100%"
|-
! style="background:#64C2ED; width=;"50%"| Best Album
! style="background:#64C2ED; width=;"50%"| Best Song
|-
|
* 'The Wagons - Rumble, Shake & Tumble
|
* Gotye featuring Kimbra - "Somebody That I Used to Know"
|-

! style="background:#64C2ED; width=;"50%"| Best Female
|-
|
* Gotye
|
* Clare Bowditch

! style="background:#64C2ED; width=;"50%"| Outstanding Achievement By a Victorian Artist
